sentences.en: Eric was my cousin Edward's boy.
sentences.cn: 埃里克是我表兄爱德华的儿子。

sentences.en: George ducked out of his forced marriage to a cousin.
sentences.cn: 乔治逃脱了和他表亲的包办婚姻。

sentences.en: He invented some story about a cousin.
sentences.cn: 他骗别人说自己有位堂兄。

sentences.en: He tracked down his cousin and uncle. The latter was sick.
sentences.cn: 他追查到了堂弟和叔叔的下落，发现叔叔这时正在病中。

sentences.en: Her cousin, a hairdresser, was perming her hair as a special treat.
sentences.cn: 她表兄是美发师，正在免费给她烫发。

sentences.en: His cousin is somebody quite high up in the navy.
sentences.cn: 他的堂兄是一位海军高官。

sentences.en: His cousin was about to wed.
His cousin was soon cursing luridly.
sentences.cn: 他的表弟立刻用极其难听的脏话大骂起来。

sentences.en: I tried again to get ahold of my cousin Joan.
sentences.cn: 我再次尝试联系我的表妹琼。

sentences.en: My cousin Mark helped me to bring in the bags.
sentences.cn: 我表弟马克帮我把包提了进来。

sentences.en: Sakota was her cousin and bosom pal.
sentences.cn: 沙科塔是她的表妹和亲密伙伴。

sentences.en: She has relinquished the post to her cousin, Sir Edward.
sentences.cn: 她把职位让给了表弟爱德华爵士.

sentences.en: She is determined to wreak vengeance on those who killed her cousin.
sentences.cn: 她决心要向杀害表妹的凶手报仇.

sentences.en: She looks a bit like his cousin Maureen.
sentences.cn: 她长得有点儿像他表姐莫琳。

sentences.en: The average European kitchen is smaller than its American cousin.
sentences.cn: 欧式的厨房一般比美式厨房小。

phrases.tran_cn: 父母的第一代堂（表）兄弟姐妹
祖父母的第一代堂（表）兄弟姐妹
第二代堂（表）兄弟姐妹；父母的第一代堂（表）兄弟姐妹的子女
父母的第二代堂（表）兄弟姐妹
第三代堂（表）兄弟姐妹；父母第二代堂（表）兄弟姐妹的子女

trans.tran_cn: 同辈表亲，堂兄弟（或姐妹），表兄弟（或姐妹）
trans.tran_en: the child of your  uncle  or  aunt
